item.title: My journey to cybersecurity 0x0.0
item.description: I will be using this blog to explain the things that I learn on my journey. I hope that this helps somebody on the way. “The person who says he knows what he thinks but cannot express it usually does not know what he thinks.” —Mortimer Adler
